about_the_game:
Thirty Days is a heavy choice driven Visual Novel, designed to have multiple play-throughs with largely different experiences.

This demo includes the first day.

Choose from 6 different main characters (3 Female, 3 Male) as you spend a month with 2 very cute 18 year old fraternal twins.

These 2 have been sheltered and only attended private schools their entire life.

Over the month you will get to experience the ups and downs as you help them learn things about the world and help them become the woman they are destined to become.

Through the month you will meet many other people that you can pursue, romance, or corrupts along with Alex and Kayla.

The overall premise of this game is kept secret as we feel its best to let the story unfold naturally.

content_descriptors.notes:
The developers describe the content like this:

This is an adult game. This will visually depict sex, nudity, oral, physical stimulation, BDSM, and Alcohol consumption

This game contains sleepwalking sexual experiences that can be perceived as a drug induced state or dubious consent.

This game will contain (can be disabled in options) some pretty heavy conversations, including conversations about self harm and suicide, never shown visually.

This game contains some conversations around alcoholism and alcohol abuse, as well as some minor conversations about physical abuse related to alcohol abuse.

None of these conversations are treated as a joke or taken in a light manner.

detailed_description:
Thirty Days is a heavy choice driven Visual Novel, designed to have multiple play-throughs with largely different experiences.

This demo includes the first day.

Choose from 6 different main characters (3 Female, 3 Male) as you spend a month with 2 very cute 18 year old fraternal twins.

These 2 have been sheltered and only attended private schools their entire life.

Over the month you will get to experience the ups and downs as you help them learn things about the world and help them become the woman they are destined to become.

Through the month you will meet many other people that you can pursue, romance, or corrupts along with Alex and Kayla.

The overall premise of this game is kept secret as we feel its best to let the story unfold naturally.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 16.04+
  • Processor: 2.0 Ghz 64-bit Intel-compatible
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.0
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Version: 10.10+
  • Processor: 2.0 Ghz 64-bit Intel-compatible (Apple silicon supported through Rosetta 2)
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.0
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any

name: Thirty Days Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 or higher.
  • Processor: 2.0 Ghz 64-bit Intel-compatible
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.0 or DirectX 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Thirty Days is a heavy choice driven Visual Novel, designed to have multiple playthroughs with largely different experiences. Choose from 6 different main characters (3 Female, 3 Male) as you spend a month with 2 very cute 18 year old fraternal twins.
